Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc12
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc12.View.Client.TUI.TUIViews

Class TUIGameView

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc12.View.Client.View
it.polimi.ingsw.gc12.View.Client.TUI.TUIViews.TUIView
it.polimi.ingsw.gc12.View.Client.TUI.TUIViews.TUIGameView
public class TUIGameView extends TUIView
The TUIGameView class represents the Textual User Interface (TUI) view for displaying the game and all the details composing the game board.

This class handles the rendering of various game elements including player stats, cards, decks, opponent fields, and the player's own field. It utilizes the Ansi library for terminal control and color rendering.

    • moveField

      public void moveField(GenericPair<Integer,Integer> dynamicFieldCenterOffset)
      Moves and displays the field currently displayed by x cards left and y cards down.

      This method updates the dynamic field center based on the provided offset redrawing the player's field including placed cards and open corners. The field is centered around the calculated field center of gravity.

      Overrides:
      moveField in class TUIView
      Parameters:
      dynamicFieldCenterOffset - The offset to adjust the field view.
